name: @vrembem/core
description: The core variables, functions and mixins for Vrembem components.

scripts.js: browserify index.js -d dist/scripts.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] | exorcist dist/scripts.js.map > dist/scripts.js
scripts.js:min: browserify index.js -d dist/scripts.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -t uglifyify --compress --mangle | exorcist dist/scripts.min.js.map > dist/scripts.min.js
